description: A healthier tuna mornay packed with veggies and loaded with flavour. Try this easy, creamy tuna pasta bake for dinner tonight.
name: Healthier Tuna Mornay Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Woolworths shredded light tasty cheese

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta, tuna, corn and three-quarters of the spinach to milk mixture, then stir to combine. Spoon mixture into a 1.75L capacity baking dish. Top with zucchini and scatter over cheese. Bake for 40 minutes or until golden and bubbling. Serve topped with remaining spinach.
